title: Which is valid conclusion from the data

content.prompt: Which of the following is a valid conclusion that the researchers could have drawn from the data?

choices.label: The measurement from the new test is likely to be better than the measurement from the original test.
The new test provides information on intelligence that is highly comparable to that provided by the original test.
The new test produces scores that are generally unrelated to those produced by the original test.
Intelligence is too abstract a concept to measure accurately.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
